comment: This file contains the metadata for tests. IMPORTANT: *DO NOT* change the uuid values

tests.name: Soil - Nitrogen
tests.description: Measures nitrate and nitrite in water. Nitrate 0 - 50 ppm, Nitrite 0 - 3.0 ppm

tests.name: Soil - pH
tests.calibration: 16 Dec 2016 using X-Rite i1Pro 2, Reagecon Buffer solutions Exp. Date: 28-06-2016

tests.name: Water - Arsenic (0 - 4000)
tests.description: Measures arsenic levels. This is a dual range test kit - choose this test when the 0-4000 ppm range is used.

tests.name: Water - Arsenic (0 - 500)
tests.description: Measures arsenic levels. This is a dual range test kit - choose this test when the 0-500 ppm range is used.

tests.name: Water - Free Chlorine
tests.description: Measures Free chlorine in water. 0 - 1 ppm

tests.name: Water - Nitrate - N & Nitrite - N
tests.description: Measures nitrate and nitrite in water. Nitrate 0 - 50 ppm, Nitrite 0 - 3.0 ppm

tests.name: Water - pH
tests.calibration: 16 Dec 2016 using X-Rite i1Pro 2, Reagecon Buffer solutions Exp. Date: 28-06-2016

tests.name: Water - Total & Free Chlorine
tests.description: Measures chlorine and free chlorine in water. 0 - 10 ppm
